snippet.title: Bulletstorm VR - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008677/

Bulletstorm VR is now available for pre-purchase with a 10% exclusive discount!
Step into the boots of Grayson Hunt after a crash landing on an abandoned resort planet forces him to make a hard choice: survival or revenge. 

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games #bulletstorm
